extension.summary: SABnzbd-Suite is a Metapackage which combines SABnzbd, SickBeard, Couchpotato and Headphones in one Addon
extension.description: SABnzbd-Suite makes Usenet as simple and streamlined as possible by automating everything we can. All you have to do is add a .nzb file. SABnzbd+ takes over from there, where it will be automatically downloaded, verified, repaired, extracted and filed away with zero human interaction.
